attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Brown
As far as i can make out you were brought up a Christian? yet you seem to follow the koran? in Britain we welcome all creeds/faiths but your government is being racist against the Christians this as always been a Christian country and always should remain so
Why are you so afraid of the Christians?you let the muslims have there say why not us?you would'nt let the Danish MP in to have his say yet you let the terroists in
i am just an everday grandma worried for the future of this country 
God bless you Patricia

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
